body_html:
@zou3519 Probably the best thing to do is manually try to broadcast in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/_functions/rnn.py#L24-L65 before calling the fused kernels. I have hard checks in the fused backend to make sure tensors are of expected size.

@hitvoice out of curiosity, why would you want initial hidden state to be broadcasted? I'm a little concerned that this would typically be an error in user script. Possibly, an inconsequential one in the grand scheme of things.
